caption:
This image depicts an expansive landscape viewed from an elevated or aerial perspective. The foreground is dominated by a barren, uneven terrain dotted with sparse vegetation, predominantly in shades of brown and green. Patches of dry, white soil suggest arid conditions, possibly salt flats or sand.

A vast body of water, likely a large lake or sea, stretches across the middle ground, extending into the distance with clear blue tones reflecting the sky. The background is marked by a mountain range spanning the horizon, its ridges appearing somewhat hazy, possibly due to atmospheric conditions such as heat or distance.

Overall, the composition of the photograph conveys a sense of remote wilderness, captured under bright sunlight that enhances the stark contrasts between the arid land and the body of water.
title: Fox bay at the south end of Pyramid Lake.  Alkaline sand flats surround the bay
